item.description:
Hey everyone,

We had so much fun last year that I thought I'd organize the trip again this year.

Here's the lowdown:

This year's Drink & Drift will be the weekend of August 13th - 15th. I've reserved a few camp sites for Friday night. I've reserved some canoes for us as well.

Here's the breakdown:

Pricing:
The cost for the weekend is $65 which includes a canoe for 2 days, transportation fee for the canoe and the campsite on Friday night (we camp along the river on Saturday night). It does not include parking. I need a $25 deposit from everyone to hold the canoes and campsites. I will forward paypal information once you've RSVP'd (everyone will initially be put on the waitlist until payment is squared away). I will hold the canoes until the end of the day on August 6th. If I haven't received a deposit from anyone I'll need to release the canoe(s) as that's the cutoff for a refund. However, we can still reserve more canoes if they are available after that point. Also, parking at Swans Falls is $8 so carpooling is ideal.

Supplies (What we'll need - please use the poll to list anything you're bringing so we don't have too much of any one item):
Tents (I have one, but we'll need more than that)
Firewood
Coolers
Food (burgers/dogs/chicken/snacks/fruit etc)
Beverages (water/alcholic/non alcoholic)
Toys (both beach and water)
Bug spray
Sunscreen
Sleeping bags (if you don't have one let me know)
Coleman Grill (I have this)
Toilet Paper
Condiments
Paper plates
Plastic Utensils
Music (I have this)
Garbage bags (I have these)

I'm planning on heading up a little early on the 13th. If anyone is interested in doing the same, let me know.

I'll keep updating this every few days so please check back periodically so we can stay on track.

Looking forward to seeing you all!!

Cat and Dog(s)
item.how_to_find_us: I have 2 little white dogs and a red convertible Beetle
item.name: Canoe Trip - Saco River (Maine)
